text: Eghtɨ ia dughiar kamɨn mongamin nguibar ekiar 3pla uam ada amɨsefegh. Egh Akar Gavgavir kɨ ia mɨkemeziba bar a dar amu, egh Ikiavɨra Itir God, ian God, ia bar a gifongegh, zurara an arazibar gɨn mangɨtɨ, a nguazir ekiar kaba bar ada isɨ ia danɨngtɨ, ia ua mongamin nguibar ekiar 3pla uam ada amɨsefegh.
